channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole at entrance to monterey close, 10th December
item.description:
The pothole has been there for a long time. You ‘temporarily’ fixed it about 2 years ago. Now there are 2 potholes in the same place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Monterey Close, Coldblow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed - Petersham, 10th December
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Leaves on Copleston Road, 10th December
item.description:
These leaves have been on the footpath for months now. They are mushy, sometimes a slip hazard. There are eldeely people living here. Somehow think I am not the only person who will have reported this?? Also, rubbish bin is a mess ..... & why is it placed right outside somebody's flat/house?!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Copleston Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New coffee shop using pavement for seating outside, 10th December
item.description:
I noticed today that the new coffee shop ( not yet open) has placed two large parasols on the pavement outside. I’m not sure if some of the area belongs to them or whether all the area belongs to the council. There is also a sign along the side of the building (can’t see it in the photo) which seems a bit low. Please can this be checked out. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 273, Broadway, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No bin collection, 10th December
item.description:

item.title: Outside no. 24, 10th December
item.description:
Wooden Bollard looks like it has been crashed into. Pavement lifting up, hazard to pedestrians. Likely that the bollard will fall over. Very bad damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betterton Street, Bloomsbury, Greater London
